vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
νεκρ-όω,
make dead, mortify, μόριόν τι [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—passive, νενεκρῶσθαι τὸ μόριον [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; to be dead, νεκρωθείς [Refs]; νενεκρωμένος, of the body of Abraham, [NT]
__II metaphorically, mortify, νεκρώσατε τὰ μέλη [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (act.) to put to death; (passive) to be as good as dead kill
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(act.) to put to death; (passive) to be as good as dead kill
primarily to put to death, kill; in NT metaphorically to deaden, mortify, Col. 3:5; passive to be rendered impotent, as good as dead Rom. 4:19; Heb. 11:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hacer morir (ptc. pf. pas. casi muerto)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm cho chết; làm chết rồi; giết chết / kiệt sức, mòn mỏi chờ chết lại. Xem G3498
